Name: Shooting Party
Description: You've received an invitation to a peculiar shooting party, seemingly related to the damaged robot in Settle Range. Go check it out.
QuestDesc: You've received an invitation to a peculiar shooting party, seemingly related to the damaged robot in Settle Range. Go check it out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange Flyer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You There! Wanna blow off some steam?

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange Flyer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And You! Wanna put your limits to the test?

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange Flyer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What About You! Wanna gain some fame and earn some bucks while you're at it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange Flyer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes! You! The one reading this flyer!

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange Flyer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: At 2:00 p.m. tomorrow, we will be hosting a grand tournament slash party at this location. Guess who's invited?

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange Flyer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You!

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange Flyer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Prove to yourself that you have what it takes to be a real badass.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange Flyer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Join us and show off your sharpshooting skills!

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange Flyer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Best of all, a mysterious prize awaits!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, we're running a major shooting tournament and party right now. Come over and join us if you want in on the fun!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Where you come from, what you do for a living. It don't matter. If you think you have a good trigger finger, you can sign up!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There are three challenges, you'll get yourself some nifty prizes for every challenge you beat. Real simple!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And the grand prize is right here inside this box next to me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Three challenges. Get through all of them, and everything here will be all yours!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whaddya say, wanna give her a spin?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Hehe, that's it, come to papa...)

Options.PlotLineKey: I think my shooting skills are up to par.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: N-nothing, it was nothing! Like I said, you sign up, and all the prizes are yours!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sweet! I knew you had it in you. Right this way, the prizes await!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And you're in luck, we happen to be offering a 20% discount if you join now! Which comes down to a total of... 500 Credits for the sign-up fee!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, it's only 500 Credits. And you look like you've got more than enough to spare. Just fork it over!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Impressive. That was a quick one!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come fetch your prizes!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, juicy... Money, money, money!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The targets are ready when you are!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Remember, shooting beyond those scrapped cars counts as instant elimination!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What a shot. You're not thinking of just stopping here, are you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How about it, ready for challenge No. 2?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You get through two more challenges, and that magnificent prize will be coming home with you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This second challenge is designed more for the pros. You get two rounds of targets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As for the sign-up fee, hehe... I'll give you another discount. Only 1,000 Credits!

Options.PlotLineKey: Do you call that a discount?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What do you mean? I'm a man of my word, 1000 Credits, hand it over!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, the ultimate challenge, is worthy of a master such as yourself. Do you accept this challenge?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This final challenge is made up of three rounds worth of targets. You get through all of it, and the grand prize is yours for the taking!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With a challenge fee of as little as 2,000 Credits! It's make it or break it! Well? Do you have what it takes?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Acting? What acting? I'm a man of my word! Come on, then. 2,000 Credits doesn't hurt, it's the ultimate prize we're talking about here!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Squeeze, breathe, and shoot! You've got talent!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come, come. Your prizes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But if you really want the ultimate prize, you better step it up a notch!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've had plenty of contestants with decent talent before, but all of them failed to beat the last challenge!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What do you say? If you want to have a go at the final challenge, come find me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What, you got a problem or something?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A loss is a loss. Rules are rules!

Options.PlotLineKey: The rules were made by you.
That whole thing is a scam.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmph, so what? I didn't plan for any of you suckers to win to begin with.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is my turf! Whatever I say goes. Oh, you don't wanna know what happened to that wannabe operator or whatever he was, when he tried to come up against me last time...

Options.PlotLineKey: You won't get away with this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Heh. You got any idea who I am? Let's beat 'em up, fellas!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I just love chumps... I mean, gracious customers like you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Step right up! The targets are all set up!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Remember, shooting beyond those scrapped cars counts as instant elimination!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, okay, so much SHC, I made a fortune this time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem! All right. The stage is all yours!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cunning Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Same deal as before. Shooting beyond those scrapped cars counts as instant elimination!
